channel.title: website on skouf.com
channel.description: Recent content in website on skouf.com

item.title: Skouf.com redesign - part 3
item.description: In the final part of my website redesign, I finish things off and simplify by merging my blog with my website, inspired by striving to be simple and other personal sites I’ve come across in the last year or so

item.title: Skouf.com redesign - part 2
item.description: In the second part of my website redesign, I think a bit about technology choices and design, and then end up stopping abruptly for a year and half

item.title: Skouf.com redesign - part 1
item.description: When I was young and naive, I built a website for myself. It’s no-longer fit for purpose, and needs a facelift. This is the first part of a multi-part series, focussing on some of the design considerations of this new skouf.com.
